tiles.title: Home
tiles.description: You wake up to the smell of roasting apples. To the North you see the open field you have spent many days in with your children, enjoying the long green grass etc. To the West you see an old bear sleeping off a hard days eating. To the South you notice a snake having a particularly difficult time eating a banana. To the East you notice a fire and hear screaming. Make your decision!

tiles.title: The Flat Cave
tiles.description: North is riddle and wings, West is home, South is Sword

events.title: TestEvent1
events.description: The cave is nearly pitch black as you cautiously enter. You hear a sharp scratching sound that echoes forward from within the cave. As you decide to abandon this spelunking trip, you feel your legs buckle from an outside floor and next thing you know, you are running as fast as you can out of the cave! Lose 10 Hit Points

tiles.title: Burning Town
tiles.description: North is tree and health, south is child, East is home

tiles.title: Shores of Smoke
tiles.description: You see your friend on the shore
